thread.title: Joey Bada$$ Says Donald Trump Is 'Not Equipped' to Be President on New 'Land of the Free' Song: Listen
thread.title_full: Joey Bada$$ Says Donald Trump Is 'Not Equipped' to Be President on New 'Land of the Free' Song: Listen

author: NHHMS
title: Joey Bada$$ Says Donald Trump Is 'Not Equipped' to Be President on New 'Land of the Free' Song: Listen
text:
http://www.billboard.com/files/styles/promo_225/public/media/Joey-Bada-press-photo-cr-Dee-Frosted-2016-billboard-1548.jpg The track is the first off his upcoming sophomore studio album, ‘AABA.’ 
Just in time for Joey Bada$$ ‘ birthday and Donald Trump’s presidential inauguration , the Brooklyn rapper has dropped a new song called “Land of the Free.” 
The politically charged track is the first off Bada$$’ sophomore studio album, AABA , that’s due out later this year sometime. On it, the 22-year-old emcee doesn’t hold back when addressing our incoming President. 
“Sorry America I will not be your soldier/ Obama just wasn’t enough, I need some more closure/ And Donald Trump is not equipped to take this country over,” he raps. 
“Land of the Free” is Bada$$’ powerful state of the nation address, confronting the country’s continued legacy of oppression, claiming “the land of the free is for the free loaders,” leaving bodies “dead in the street to be their organ donors” and disorganizing the black population to make them “all loners.” 
Download the track here and stream it below: TAGS
